name: Gateway to Hell
storyline:
Whilst walking through a building site, you fall down an old disused well and into a long forgotten castle, buried by time, underground.

Now you must find the exit of the castle before your time runs out.
summary: A isometric game where you must find the exit in a labyrinth castle.
